data.title: Disguised Wizards
data.statement: You are a royal guard at a castle. There has been a recent problem with wizards sneaking in and causing magical mischief. Your job is to filter these wizards out while letting through everyone else that's supposed to be in the castle. A wizard's entire name has all of the letters of the word "wizard" in it, so you will get their name then determine if they are a wizard or not.

testCases.title: One Wizard
testCases.testIn:
6
Sofia Amberson
Turtle Tortise
Mike Pothole
Wayne Drimaz
Wave Trainor
Meghan Title
testCases.testOut:
Not a wizard
Not a wizard
Not a wizard
Is a wizard
Not a wizard
Not a wizard

Not a wizard

data.constraints:
2 < [[N]] < 11

Rules for names:
- Each name will be 8 to 30 characters long
- Each name will have 1 space and 2 capital letters
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read names:string(30)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
An integer [[N]] for the number of people trying to enter the castle.
The next [[N]] lines are the names of the people trying to enter the castle.
data.outputDescription: For every [[N]] person trying to enter the castle print either "Is a wizard" if you catch wizard or "Not a wizard" if they are not a wizard.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are a royal guard at a castle. There has been a recent problem with wizards sneaking in and causing magical mischief. Your job is to filter these wizards out while letting through everyone else that's supposed to be in the castle. A wizard's entire name has all of the letters of the word "wizard" in it, so you will get their name then determine if they are a wizard or not.
Input
An integer N for the number of people trying to enter the castle.
The next N lines are the names of the people trying to enter the castle.
Output
For every N person trying to enter the castle print either "Is a wizard" if you catch wizard or "Not a wizard" if they are not a wizard.
Constraints
2 < N < 11

Rules for names:
- Each name will be 8 to 30 characters long
- Each name will have 1 space and 2 capital letters
Example
Input
6
Sofia Amberson
Turtle Tortise
Mike Pothole
Wayne Drimaz
Wave Trainor
Meghan Title
Output
Not a wizard
Not a wizard
Not a wizard
Is a wizard
Not a wizard
Not a wizard
